tooltip.era_tweaks.paladin_desc: §7§oA typical paladin is a mighty warrior in shining armor, channeling his strength to protect the weak. Two-handed swords and heavy armor are your path, and holy magic will help you overcome your enemies.
tooltip.era_tweaks.bowman_desc: §7§oA good bowman is a professional in his field. Professionals have standards. Be polite. Be efficient. Have a plan to kill everyone you meet. Bows, crossbows—these are all suitable for covering your comrades from afar.
tooltip.era_tweaks.scout_desc: §7§oScouts are agile and nimble. Though your health is not great, you are blessed with speed and strength. A few quick strikes, turn, repeat — and your target gone. Maybe.
tooltip.era_tweaks.warrior_desc: §7§oWarrior is a class for true fans of both close and long-range weapon combat. Be a man (even if you're a woman) – choose our candidate! And depending on your subclass, you can be a mighty fighter clad in armor, charging forward and crushing enemies like a tank; a cautious marksman, raining down arrows on the enemy; or a light and sneaky assassin, ready to plunge a light blade into a distracted enemy.
text.era_tweaks.another_class: Being %s, you cannot learn the %s's skills!
